title: Convex Analysis and Monotone Operator Theory in Hilbert Spaces

tldr.text: This book provides a largely self-contained account of the main results of convex analysis and optimization in Hilbert space, and a concise exposition of related constructive fixed point theory that allows for a wide range of algorithms to construct solutions to problems in optimization, equilibrium theory, monotone inclusions, variational inequalities, and convex feasibility.
